text: Anne Golon (17 December 1921 – 14 July 2017) was a French author, better known to English-speaking readers as Sergeanne Golon. She was most known for a series of novels about a heroine called Angelique.BFMTV - Actualités en continu et info en direct et replay She was born in Toulon, France. She was married to her writing partner Serge Golon until his death in 1972.
